what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Gimme R! Gimme S! Gimme Rock Stone. rockandstone package playing voicelines video game Deep Rock Galactic R.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Install development version GitHub :

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: default voiceline pool includes “Safe Work” voicelines. “Safe Work Voicelines” (profanity) opt-. voiceline pool can also reduced certain categories /sentiments suit use case. Voicelines can played error setting error argument options(). can specified startup files .Rprofile make persist across sessions.
code: library(rockandstone) rockandstone() rockandstone(nsfw = TRUE) rockandstone(category = "salute") rockandstone(sentiment = "negative") options(error = function() rockandstone(sentiment = "negative"))

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: rockandstone currently uses beepr package play sounds R.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Sound playback handled audio package external program needed.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Sound playback handled one : paplay utility Pulse Audio system aplay utility ALSA system VLC media player installed PATH

title: Creatures of Hoxxes data — creatures
text: data frame 99 rows 9 columns: name creature name species creature species biome creature biome base_health base health creature health_scaling health scaling creature pathfinder_type creature moves pathfinder_preference creature moves burn_temp temperature creature burns freeze_temp temperature creature freezes

text: file_ogg .ogg file path

title: Play voicelines — play_voiceline
text: NULL

title: Play a random voiceline — rockandstone
text: rockandstone() plays random voiceline. useful, example, get notified script finished.

title: Play a random voiceline — rockandstone
code: rockandstone(category = NULL, sentiment = NULL, nsfw = FALSE)

title: Play a random voiceline — rockandstone
text: category optional character vector specifying voiceline categories include playback. See voiceline_categories() options. sentiment optional character vector specifying voiceline sentiments include playback. Options "positive", "negative", "neutral". nsfw logical specifying whether include "Safe Work" voicelines include profanity. Default FALSE.

title: Play a random voiceline — rockandstone
text: NULL

title: Play a random voiceline — rockandstone
code: # By default the voiceline pool includes all "Safe For Work" voicelines rockandstone() #> Error in loadNamespace(x): there is no package called ‘av’  # "Not Safe For Work Voicelines" (with profanity) are opt-in rockandstone(nsfw = TRUE) #> Error in loadNamespace(x): there is no package called ‘av’  # The voiceline pool can be reduced to certain categories and/or sentiments # to suit your use case rockandstone(category = "salute") #> Error in loadNamespace(x): there is no package called ‘av’ rockandstone(sentiment = "negative") #> Error in loadNamespace(x): there is no package called ‘av’

title: Select a random voiceline — select_voiceline
text: arguments rockandstone().

title: Select a random voiceline — select_voiceline
code: select_voiceline(category = NULL, sentiment = NULL, nsfw = FALSE)

title: Get voiceline categories — voiceline_categories
text: Get voiceline categories

title: Get voiceline categories — voiceline_categories
text: character vector.

title: Get voiceline categories — voiceline_categories
code: # Get voiceline categories voiceline_categories() #>  [1] "salute"          "jukebox"         "falling"         "friendly fire"   #>  [5] "drop pod"        "random comments" "hoxxes shout"    "downed shout"    #>  [9] "beer shout"      "overheating"     "driller"         "engineer"        #> [13] "gunner"          "scout"           "we're rich"      "calling mule"    #> [17] "depositing"      "grabber"         "grappling"
